Uses of Interface
com.dhemery.core.Sampler

Packages that use Sampler
com.dhemery.core Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions. 
com.dhemery.expressing Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met. 
 

Uses of Sampler in com.dhemery.core
 

Classes in com.dhemery.core that implement Sampler
 class NamedSampler<V>
          A sampler described by a fixed name.
 

Uses of Sampler in com.dhemery.expressing
 

Classes in com.dhemery.expressing that implement Sampler
 class FeatureSampler<S,F>
          A sampler that samples a feature of a subject.
